dct_title_s: Bartholomew's "quarter-inch to mile" map of Scotland
dct_description_sm: Cover title: Bartholomew's road map of Scotland.
Relief shown by gradient tints, form lines, and spot heights.
Each sheet individually titled and numbered.
Statements of attribution differ, e.g.: John Bartholomew & Co. -- Sifton, Praed & Co., Ltd., The Map House.
Include index to sheets on cover.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
